blessings.description: OMG they noticed us. Steal a random player from the Idol Leaderboard.
blessings.subheader: Brought to you by @The Multitude Podcast Collective@http://multitude.productions/blaseball
blessings.title: Popular by Association

blessings.description: Steal 3 random players from the Internet Series Champion.
blessings.subheader: Brought to you by @The Orange Groves Podcast Network@http://www.theorangegroves.com/blaseball
blessings.title: Champs in the Making

blessings.description: Item. A sawed-off bat of protection. Impossible to wield. Minimize a Player, but they shield your team from incineration.
blessings.title: The Iffey Jr.

blessings.description: Single-Serving Heat. Make a random player on your team Spicy.
blessings.title: Hot Sauce Packet

blessings.description: Because, that's why. Re-rolls your team's 3 worst hitters.
blessings.title: Paracausal Event

blessings.description: Arrange your lineup in order of their Idolatry.
blessings.title: Headliners

blessings.description: Steal the 14th Most Idolized Player in the League.
blessings.title: Lottery Pick

blessings.description: Steal the 21st Most Idolized Player on the Leaderboard.
blessings.title: Blind Date

blessings.description: Give all of the teams that are not in your division Targeted Shame.
blessings.title: The Shame Bubble

blessings.description: Plug in. Give your team Electric blood type.
blessings.title: Closed Circuit

blessings.description: Everyone kept chanting my name, it was SO EMBARRASSING. Protect a Player from being Idolized.
blessings.title: Humblebrag

blessings.description: Look at me. Most Idolized player on your team gives double-payouts as an Idol.
blessings.title: Center of Attention

blessings.description: Armor. Protect a random Player on your team from Incinerations.
blessings.title: Scorpler's Jacket

blessings.description: Steal Armor from a random player on an opposing team.
blessings.title: Hand-Me Downs

blessings.description: Feed your hitters coffee grounds. Team hitting changes anywhere from -5% to +15%
blessings.title: Pretty Plz?

blessings.description: Re-rolls your team's 3 worst pitchers.
blessings.title: Exploratory Surgeries

blessings.description: Recruit a rookie to be the 10th player in your lineup.
blessings.title: New Recruit

blessings.description: Remove the worst player from your lineup. Your lineup is now shorter.
blessings.title: Downsizing

blessings.description: Stretch. Reroll your 3 worst Baserunners' baserunning.
blessings.title: Jelly Legs

blessings.description: Cover yourselves in the stuff. Re-roll your three worst Defenders' defense.
blessings.title: Stickum

decrees.description: The Top 4 Teams of the Regular Season must run an extra base next season.
decrees.title: Fifth Base

decrees.description: The Top 4 Teams of the Regular Season will walk batters on the 3rd Ball of an At-Bat instead of the 4th next season.
decrees.title: Walk in the Park

decrees.description: The Top 4 Teams of the Regular Season cannot win blessings in this Election.
decrees.title: Bless Off
